001package io.jstach.rainbowgum;
002
003import java.util.ArrayList;
004import java.util.List;
005import java.util.function.BiFunction;
006import java.util.function.Function;
007
008import org.eclipse.jdt.annotation.Nullable;
009
010/**
011 * A factory that may need config to provide.
012 *
013 * @param <T> component
014 */
015@FunctionalInterface
016public interface LogProvider<T> {
017
018        /*
019         * TODO maybe make this sealed with sub provider types?
020         */
021
022        /**
023         * Creates the component from config. The component is not always guaranteed to be new
024         * object.
025         * @param name config name of the parent component.
026         * @param config config.
027         * @return component.
028         */
029        T provide(String name, LogConfig config);
030
031        /**
032         * Convenience for flattening nullable providers.
033         * @param <U> component
034         * @param provider nullable provider
035         * @param name name of parent component and can be ignored if not needed.
036         * @param config config used to provide if not null.
037         * @return maybe null component.
038         */
039        @SuppressWarnings("exports")
040        public static <U> @Nullable U provideOrNull(@Nullable LogProvider<U> provider, String name, LogConfig config) {
041                if (provider == null) {
042                        return null;
043                }
044                return provider.provide(name, config);
045        }
046
047        /**
048         * Creates a provider of instance that is already configured.
049         * @param <U> component
050         * @param instance component instance.
051         * @return this.
052         */
053        public static <U> LogProvider<U> of(U instance) {
054                return (n, c) -> instance;
055        }
056
057        /**
058         * Wraps with an error description.
059         * @param description description function passed the name and returns description.
060         * @return wrapped provider.
061         */
062        default LogProvider<T> describe(String description) {
063                return wrap(this, (k, t) -> "Failure providing " + description + ". cause:\n" + t.getMessage());
064        }
065
066        /**
067         * Wraps with an error description.
068         * @param description description function passed the name and returns description.
069         * @return wrapped provider.
070         */
071        default LogProvider<T> describe(Function<String, String> description) {
072                return wrap(this, (k, t) -> "Failure providing " + description.apply(k) + ". cause:\n" + t.getMessage());
073        }
074
075        private static <U> LogProvider<U> wrap(LogProvider<U> provider, BiFunction<String, Throwable, String> description) {
076                return (n, c) -> {
077                        try {
078                                return provider.provide(n, c);
079                        }
080                        catch (Exception e) {
081                                @SuppressWarnings("null")
082                                String desc = description.apply(n, e);
083                                throw new ProvisionException(desc, e);
084                        }
085                };
086        }
087
088        /**
089         * Flattens a list of providers to a single provider of a list.
090         * @param <U> provider type.
091         * @param providers list of providers.
092         * @return provider of list.
093         */
094        public static <U> LogProvider<List<U>> flatten(List<LogProvider<U>> providers) {
095                return (n, c) -> {
096                        List<U> list = new ArrayList<>();
097                        for (var p : providers) {
098                                list.add(p.provide(n, c));
099                        }
100                        return list;
101                };
102        }
103
104        // /**
105        // * Flattens a property of a provider.
106        // * @param <U>
107        // * @param property
108        // * @return
109        // */
110        // public static <U> LogProvider<U> flatten(LogProperty.Property<LogProvider<U>>
111        // property) {
112        // return (n, c) -> property.get(c.properties()).value().provide(n, c);
113        // }
114
115        /**
116         * Thrown if a provider fails and a description needs to be added.
117         */
118        public static class ProvisionException extends RuntimeException {
119
120                private static final long serialVersionUID = -1666167238381090332L;
121
122                ProvisionException(String message, Throwable cause) {
123                        super(message, cause);
124                        // TODO Auto-generated constructor stub
125                }
126
127        }
128
129}
